response.original_title: Life Of Agony: River Runs Again
response.overview: Recorded & filmed live at Irving Plaza, NYC, January 3rd & 4th, 2003. Mastered at Master Suite, Hollywood, CA.  The special edition DVD contains extra bonus material including in-depth band interviews, interactive Menu screens, Band Biography, Discography and never-before-seen video footage from the band's personal collections.  Artwork By [Art Direction, Design & Layout] – Alan Robert  Bass – Alan Robert  Drums – Sal Abruscato  Engineer [Audio], Mixed By – Brian Joseph Dobbs*  Guitar – Joey Z.  Mastered By – Dave Collins  Photography – Christine Zagami, David "Bagel" Ungar, Jason Zampino  Vocals – Keith Caputo  Written-By – Life Of Agony (tracks: 1.01 to 1.11, 2.01 to 2.07)
response.title: Life Of Agony: River Runs Again
